message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split to end this quickly.
I think we can both do better.  Let's split it 60/40, with me getting the larger share.  This way, we both get more than what Alice proposed and we can get this over with.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. I'm willing to compromise. Let's go with 55/45 in my favor. It's still more than your last offer and saves us both from further losses due to inflation.
